[
    name=goToBeeville;
    displayName=Go to Bee Village;

    firstState=talkToBee;

    {
        name=talkToBee;
        displayName=Talk to worker bee about your situation
    }

    {
        name=fightFirstEnemy;
        displayName=Defeat the <probably beaver> blocking your path;

        completionType=enemy;

        completionValue=wasp;

        requirements=talkToBee;
    }

    {
        name=followToTown;
        displayName=Follow worker bee to Bee Village;

        completionType=world;

        completionValue=beetown;

        requirements=fightFirstEnemy;
    }
]


[
    name=findSad;
    displayName=Find Bob-omb;

    firstState=ask;

    {
        name=ask;
        displayName=Ask Villagers;

        completionType=item;

        completionValue=emak:2;
    }

    {
        name=tell;
        displayName=Tell villagers;
        requirements=ask;
    }

    {
        name=say;
        displayName=Do it to villagers;
        requirements=tell;
    }

]

[

    name=getBand;
    displayName=Talk to the man tm;

    firstState=talk;

    {
        name=talk;
        displayName=Are they there?;

    }
]
